text: We all have #COVID19 #vaccine questions, so I'm proud to host a virtual town hall in partnership with the PA Dept. of Health & other local legislators on Jan 22 at 1:30pm. Sign up at: https://t.co/aB4P6CCnuB Also, check out the Dept's updated vaccine plan https://t.co/QMXTDopPL6 https://t.co/4DMNt5oVE6
